java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class UIHintNodeLabelPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Displays a list of node labels whose labels start with the passed string.

Constructor Detail

UIHintNodeLabelPanel

public UIHintNodeLabelPanel(UIViewPane uiviewpane,
                            UINode node,
                            int xPos,
                            int yPos,
                            java.lang.String text)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor. Searches the database and displays a list of node labels starting with the passed string.

Parameters:
UIViewPane - uiviewpane, the view pane we are to draw this panel in.
NodeSummary - node, the node whose label is being searched.
int - xPos, the x position to draw this panel.
int - yPos, the y position to draw this panel.
String - text, the node label text to search on.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

searchLabel

public boolean searchLabel(java.lang.String text,
                           java.lang.String nodeid)
Search the database for the given string excluding in the results the passed nodeid. Load the results into the displayed list.

Parameters:
String - text, the text to match against the start of node labels.
String - nodeid, the id of the node to exclude from the search results.
Returns:
boolean, true if results found and loaded, else false.
